title: Joining clubs and chat
body: I made a club in league of legends and I can't join in on the chat room tab. It says joining... but it never connects. I've waited 2 hours and nothing happens. I've tried to create the club MULTIPLE times and still the same problem. I deleted league and re-installed it and nothing happened. Anyone know how this can be fixed?

replies.body: You may be having a network issue staying connected to the chat servers, so reinstalling league may not really resolve this.  If you're still having an issue with this, our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help!  Let me know if you have any questions!
